skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Reach
skill.description: For an agent to know how to move and reach a destination.

parameter.name: urgency
parameter.description: Set to true if the agent is in a hurry; false otherwise. Impacts the agent lomotion pace.

parameter.name: pathType
parameter.description: Type of path that agent can use to reach its target.

resource.name: agent.behaviors.resources.Motion
resource.description: An agent cannot move to more than one destination at once.
